resources: ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- // Authorization Page using Phone Number Log In to Account Using the phone number linked to Odyssey ID Enter Phone Please enter the phone number completely // User Agreement Modal User Agreement Accept Agreement // Error Occurred Modal An Error Occurred An unexpected error occurred while attempting to log into your account. Please contact customer support. Contact Support Try Again // Account Deactivated Modal Account Deactivated Dear %1$s, Your account has been deactivated by your employer. If you have any questions, please contact customer support. // Contact Support Modal Call 24/7, including weekends Write on WhatsApp Write on Telegram operator online Cancel // SMS Code Entry Page Enter Code An SMS with the authorization code has been sent to the number %1$s 0 Resend SMS Resend SMS: %1$d sec Change Number Didn\'t receive the SMS code? Contact our customer support. Contact Customer Support Back Fill in all fields SMS code retrieval timeout expired The number of requests per minute has exceeded the norm. Please try again in %1$d seconds. // Log In Page Using IIN Number not found.\n Log in using IIN Number %1$s not found. Please enter your IIN. Log in using IIN IIN Please enter your IIN completely // Add Phone Number Page Add Phone Number An employee was found with the provided IIN Add Phone Number // Update Phone Number Page Change Phone Number A phone number is already linked to the given IIN. Do you want to change it? Change IIN Go to Login Page // Employee Not Found Modal Employee Not Found No employee with IIN: %1$s found. Double-check your details and try again. // Application Sent Modal Application Sent Your application to change the phone number to %1$s has been successfully sent. Processing may take up to 30 minutes. After confirmation, you will receive a notification on your phone. Close Window // Phone Number Update Error Modal Failed to add a phone number for the provided IIN. Please try again or contact customer support. ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- // Bottom Navigation Menu Home Trips Search Help Profile // Home Page See All Notifications You don\'t have any new notifications yet 24/7 Help Nearest Trip to support Write to online chat Read questions/answers Restarting the app in 5 seconds Update Error! Result Code: %1$d No internet connection Mo Tu We Th Fr Sa Su You don\'t have WhatsApp installed! You don\'t have Telegram installed! You are not authorized! // Voucher Voucher Balance My Voucher Your voucher has not been opened yet Voucher\nBalance Spent The voucher update date will be shown after opening Operation History Date Sum You have not made any purchases using the voucher yet. Transactions will appear here after making a payment with the voucher. // Debt Debt Current\nDebt You have not made any purchases on credit yet. Transactions will appear here after making such a purchase. Operation and Date // Trips Page Active Trips Archive Trips My Trips Tickets have not been purchased yet! When the coordinator purchases and processes the tickets for this trip, all the necessary information will be displayed. Close Departure Destination Shift Trip Status To Work, %1$s To Home, %1$s Trip, %1$s Emergency Application. No Active Trips New trips will appear here when they are assigned You don\'t have any trips yet Here, you will see the history of your trips // Various Statuses Route is unknown, tickets are not processed yet. Tickets are not processed yet. The trip is on the waiting list. Processing deadline: until %1$s. The trip was fully canceled due to: %1$s. The trip was fully canceled due to: %1$s. Cancellation date: %2$s. Some tickets are not processed yet. Some tickets are on the waiting list. Processing deadline: until %1$s. Some tickets were canceled due to: %1$s. Some tickets are processed. The trip is partly processed. // Application Detail Modal Application #%1$s %1$s. %2$d h %3$d min in transit" in transit %1$d h %2$d min train carriage seat Trip Tickets Click to download tickets are not purchased tickets are on the waiting list Open ticket: %1$s - %2$s Ticket not found You don\'t have an app to open PDF files Open downloaded ticket? Transfer in city %1$s: %2$d h %3$d min Transfer in city %1$s Price %1$d KZT Total Show Tickets Create Refund Request Tickets are not purchased yet! The trip is canceled! The trip is partly processed! Some tickets are processed, some tickets are canceled! No information for train %1$s – %2$s We\'re waiting for information about the train, time, etc. // Sorting Sort By Departure Date By Status By Departure Date\nFirst upcoming By Status\nFirst processed // Filters Filters Processed Partly Processed Canceled Assigned Direction (for corporate) All Home Only To Work Only Reset Show // Refund Choose tickets for refund Check the tickets you want to refund Next Specify the reason for refund Trip cancelled Dissatisfied with train or seats I or a family member got ill Can\'t catch the train Your variant… Send refund application Refund application sent Refund application #%1$d has been created and sent for approval to the curator. You can track its status in “My Trips”. Back to trips Cancel refund application Cancel refund application? The application will be canceled, but you can create it again. Refund Applications Refund Applications by Trip Manage refund applications for the current trip Create refund application Refund Tickets Details Cancel Sending Date Specified Reason Tickets for Refund Refund application cancelled You have canceled refund application #%1$d. Kazakhstan Temir Zholy, %1$s %2$s Carriage %1$s • %2$s • Class %3$s • Seat %4$s Refund Application #%1$d Application under review Tickets sent for refund Tickets refunded Refund application rejected Refund application cancelled Error during refund Waiting for confirmation of the refund application The dispatcher sent the tickets for refund based on your application %1$s Tickets for the application have been refunded %1$s Due to: “%1$s” The application was cancelled by you %1$s An error occurred while attempting to refund tickets An error occurred while attempting to refund tickets: %1$s The remaining tickets have been refunded. Refund rejected Sent for refund Refund confirmed Refunded Refund error // Search Page Ticket search The ticket purchase section is currently under development You will soon be able to purchase air and railway tickets within the Odyssey app. We will notify you when this section becomes operational. Go to the main page // Help Page Customer support is available 24/7, including weekends and holidays. Call Support Write to Support Questions and Answers Press Service // Call and Write to Support Modals Our online consultants are available around the clock. Feel free to ask any questions. If you encounter any difficulties with the app or your trip, you can call us at your convenience:\n\n%1$s\n\nWe also recommend contacting our 24/7 online chat. // FAQ Page What are you interested in? Open No Questions Found There might be no questions at the moment or there might be an error. Please try again later. // Press Service Page Find… No News Found There might be no news at the moment or there might be an error. Please try again later. TODAY, AT %1$s YESTERDAY, AT %1$s ON %1$s AT %2$s // Profile Page My Profile Company Position Badge Number ODYSSEY_ID Personal Data Documents Notifications User Agreement Logout Go Main Information First Name Last Name Middle Name Date of Birth Gender Male Female Citizenship Kazakhstan Contact Information Phone Email Save Attention! Changing citizenship will affect the default document Make sure to check the information in the “Documents” section and choose the correct default document. Choose Change Citizenship Data successfully updated Enter the code from the SMS sent to the number %1$s Enter the phone number An SMS code will be sent to this number for confirmation Continue Phone number successfully updated Now use the number\n %1$s for logging into your account Go Back Invalid email address Enter your first name Enter your last name Invalid data Document ID Document Passport Residency Permit Foreign Document Issued / Expires You haven\'t provided your document information yet. Click to add. Documents Not Found We couldn\'t find your documents Use as Default Document This document will be used as the primary document for ticket reservations Default Fill in Document No. Status Active Permission No. Issue Date Expiration Date Issuing Authority Document No. Be careful when filling out. Data must match the document. Name (in Latin) Last Name (in Latin) Notifications Not Found You currently have no new notifications Important Notification Thanks, I\'ve read it Learn More %1$d hrs ago %1$d min ago Trip not found! Turn On Notifications This is important: we will notify you about changes in trips, important news, and document issues. Turn On Remind Me Later Close and Log Out No Internet Connection Couldn\'t update data: no internet connection. Please try again later.
